metadata.title: Documentation: Where is the ASSP hardware user manual located?

sections.content:
Question:
Where is the ASSP hardware user manual located?
Answer:
The ASSP user manual is not necessary since the functionality of the included application is pre-programmed and fixed, so there is no need to develop any application from end user perspective. The datasheet specifies the high-level hardware features and the electrical characteristics of the device, and the user manual of the evaluation kit specifies the implemented software functionality.
Suitable Products
RISC-V Voice ASSP
